skins.selfIntroduction: I am Yuubari, Sakura Empire Yuubari-class light cruiser. I was developed under the constraints of a naval treaty, but this conversely allowed me to utilize a great number of new technologies. I served as the flagship of a Destroyer Squadron in the Pacific War. Hmm... I will need many oxygen torpedoes if I am to research them...
skins.acquisition: I am light cruiser Yuubari. You say we've met before, Master? Hmm... b-but that's not possible... I don't have any sisters after all...
skins.login: With you by my side, Master, I have nothing to fear...!
skins.details: Be they canisters or weaponry, my developments in them are the latest!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Melon bread? I'm extraordinarily curious as to how it tastes...
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Gatos are terrifying... Why are such frightening submarines named after a catshark?
skins.secretaryTouch: Your hand is so warm and gentle, Master~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Mmh... ugh... gah... stop, or I will bite!

skins.shipDescription: I've finally finished developing my new equipment! Since we still have time, let's go and try it out in live combat right now, Master!
skins.acquisition: I've finally finished developing my new equipment! Since we still have time, let's go and try it out in live combat right now, Master!
skins.login: Master, are you here to help me gather data today?
skins.details: Akashi is really enthusiastic about helping my research, but it feels like she has some ulterior motives...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Research always comes with failure... but with your support, Master, all these difficulties will pass!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Nnh... I'm a bit tired... Can I rest here for a while?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The way I am now, I won't be afraid even if I run into a Gato-class, probably...
skins.secretaryTouch: Master, you have to remember to get some rest, all right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Augh... I'm going to smack you!
